bug.author: yijhe
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
File "train.py", line 433, in train() # train normally File "train.py", line 319, in train dataloader=testloader) File "/home/u107305002/networks/yolov3/test.py", line 97, in test output = non_max_suppression(inf_out, conf_thres=conf_thres, iou_thres=iou_thres) # nms File "/home/u107305002/networks/yolov3/utils/utils.py", line 571, in non_max_suppression i = torchvision.ops.boxes.batched_nms(boxes, scores, c, iou_thres) File "/home/u107305002/.conda/envs/huang_yolov3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torchvision/ops/boxes.py", line 76, in batched_nms keep = nms(boxes_for_nms, scores, iou_threshold) File "/home/u107305002/.conda/envs/huang_yolov3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torchvision/ops/boxes.py", line 36, in nms return torch.ops.torchvision.nms(boxes, scores, iou_threshold) File "/home/u107305002/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/_ops.py", line 61, in getattr op = torch._C._jit_get_operation(qualified_op_name) RuntimeError: No such operator torchvision::nms <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
I am practicing use yolov3 network for own datasets I command following: python train.py --data data/rbc.data --cfg cfg/yolov3-tiny.cfg --epoch 10 --weights weights/yolov3-tiny.weights
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
To get the trained model. <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>

I already following the requirements.txt but still got the nms error.please help me to solve this problem, thanks a lot

comments.comment: Your dependencies are out of date, you need to update torch and torchvision

Your dependencies are out of date, you need to update torch and torchvision
thanks for answering. but my pytorch is version 1.4.0, and torchvision is version 0.5. all of them are newest, right?

Your dependencies are out of date, you need to update torch and torchvision
thanks a lot! I use "conda update pytorch torchvision" and reinstall pillow version<7. Already solve this problem. thanks again.

Great! You can also use one of the following if you have future environment issues. <denchmark-h:h2>Reproduce Our Environment</denchmark-h>
To access an up-to-date working environment (with all dependencies including CUDA/CUDNN, Python and PyTorch preinstalled), consider a:
GCP Deep Learning VM with $300 free credit offer: GCP Quickstart Guide Google Colab Notebook with 12 hours of free GPU time: Google Colab Notebook Docker Image from https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3. See Docker Quickstart Guide
